This is an R Markdown document. This document contains information regarding the Reproducible Research-Peer Assessment 1

```{r}
##  Read activity.csv file if it exists
if (file.exists("activity.csv")) {
        Activity_df <- read.csv("activity.csv")
        }
##  Determine the total number of steps taken each day.
Steps_per_day <- tapply(Activity_df$steps, Activity_df$date, sum)
##  Convert results into a data frame
Steps_per_day_df <- data.frame(Steps_per_day)
head(Steps_per_day_df)
```
